SEARCH
Package com.dhk.models

Class HotKey

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.models.HotKey
public class HotKey extends Object
This class represents the model for a Hot Key. States and the string representation of the Hot Key are defined here.
Version:
1.3.1
Author:
Jonathan Miller
License:
The MIT License
Copyright:
Jonathan Miller 2024
